logicPuzzles.question: What has keys but can’t open locks?
What has hands but can’t clap?
What gets wetter as it dries?
What has a neck but no head?
What has one eye but cannot see?
What has many teeth but cannot bite?
What gets broken without being held?
What has a thumb and four fingers but is not alive?
What has a head and a tail but no body?
What begins with T, ends with T, and has T inside?
What can you break even if you never touch it?
What is full of holes but still holds water?
What has a face and two hands but no arms or legs?
What has a heart that doesn’t beat?
What runs without walking?
What has cities but no houses, rivers but no water, and forests but no trees?
What can travel around the world while staying in one corner?
What has legs but cannot walk?
What goes up but never comes down?
What has a ring but no finger?
What belongs to you but is used more by others?
What has a bed but never sleeps and a mouth but never eats?
What gets bigger the more you take away?
What has no beginning, end, or middle?
What can fill a room but takes up no space?
What is always in front of you but never seen?
What has words but never speaks?
What tastes better than it smells?
What has ears but cannot hear?
What has one head, one foot, and four legs?
What kind of room has no doors or windows?
What has a spine but no bones?
What can you catch but not throw?
What can be cracked, made, told, and played?
What has four wheels and flies?
What is so fragile that saying its name breaks it?
What invention lets you see through walls?
What never asks questions but gets answered all the time?
What has a bottom at the top?
What goes through cities and fields but never moves?
What has many rings but no fingers?
What has branches but no fruit, trunk, or leaves?
What can you hold without ever touching it?
What flies without wings?
What has a bark but no bite?
What has roots that nobody sees and is taller than trees?
What comes down but never goes up?
What has a tail but no body?
What must be broken before you can use it?
What goes up and down but never moves?
